name: DD_DIA_CMS_GENDER
description: This table contains patients' gender identities as submitted for CMS ESRD patient registration forms (CMS-2728).

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DD_DIA_CMS_GENDER_C_NAME
columns.description: The dialysis patient gender identity category ID for the CMS Form 2728 abstraction.
